reference.shortdesc: The prophead element contains elements that provide labels for the columns in a properties table.

draft-comment.author: Kristen J Eberlein
draft-comment.p: What are our expectations if a properties list does not contain a header row? Do we expect stylesheets might generate headings/labels? Do we expect that author-supplied headings always override those provided by stylesheets?

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The prophead element is specialized from sthead. It is defined in the reference module.
